mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFO QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFOPATHNM FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS "qestnrTmplatId", QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS "qestnrTmplatTy", FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm", FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_IMAGE_INFO AS "qestnrTmplatImagepathnm", QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC AS "qestnrTmplatCn", QUSTNR_TMPLAT_PATH_NM AS "qestnrTmplatCours" FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
